name: FACE SHIELD
description:
Timing, blocking, and bullet dodging, can you do it?

A game where faces of the die manipulate the type of your shield: 1 = small shield, 2 = split shield, 3 = half shield, 4 = full shield. However, larger shields are thinner and weaker (i.e. can't block larger bullets).

Controls: WASD to move, view die configuration by clicking the die in the corner.
